p: The study physician will complete the NACC (Version 2) Forms that take 35–40 min and include history, neurological exam with assessment of Parkinsonian signs, psychiatric assessment that includes the short version of the Geriatric Depression Scale and the Neuropsychiatric Inventory, Functional Activities Questionnaire (administered to the caregiver), vascular risk factors and the modified Hachinski ischaemic scale. 45
